scripts.build:shared: pnpm shared build && pnpm admin-shared build && pnpm test-shared build
scripts.deploy:default:web: pnpm deploy:default:indexes && pnpm deploy:default:rules && pnpm deploy:default:cloudrun && pnpm deploy:default:hosting
scripts.deploy:default:cloudrun: pnpm gcloud:default run deploy app --region asia-northeast1 --memory 1Gi --source .
scripts.emulators:start:dev: pnpm build:functions && firebase emulators:start --only auth,firestore,functions --project dev --import=.emulators-data --export-on-exit
scripts.emulators:start:test: pnpm build:functions && firebase emulators:start --only auth,firestore,functions --project test
scripts.emulators:start:test:rules:firestore: pnpm build:shared && firebase emulators:start --only firestore --project demo-firestore-rules
scripts.firebase:functions:packages:pack: pnpm build:shared && pnpm shared pack --pack-destination ../../services/functions && pnpm admin-shared pack --pack-destination ../../services/functions
scripts.firebase:functions:packages:add: pnpm firebase:functions:packages:pack && pnpm functions add ./local-shared-1.0.0.tgz && pnpm functions add ./local-admin-shared-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.firebase:functions:predeploy: rm -rf services/functions/node_modules && pnpm install && pnpm functions lint && pnpm firebase:functions:packages:add && (pnpm functions remove @local/test-shared || true) && pnpm functions build
scripts.firebase:functions:postdeploy: pnpm firebase:functions:packages:remove && pnpm functions add @local/shared @local/admin-shared && pnpm functions add -D @local/test-shared
scripts.format: pnpm shared format && pnpm admin-shared format && pnpm test-shared format && pnpm format:web && pnpm functions format
scripts.lint: pnpm shared lint && pnpm admin-shared lint && pnpm test-shared lint && pnpm lint:web && pnpm functions lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm shared lint:fix && pnpm admin-shared lint:fix && pnpm test-shared lint:fix && pnpm lint:web:fix && pnpm functions lint:fix
scripts.rm:node_modules: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test:all: pnpm test:app && pnpm test:e2e && pnpm test:functions && pnpm test:admin-shared && pnpm test:rules:firestore
scripts.test:app: pnpm build:shared && tsx scripts/src/emulatorsExec.ts --only auth,firestore --project test --script 'pnpm test:web:app'
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm build:functions && tsx scripts/src/emulatorsExec.ts --only auth,firestore,functions --project test --script 'env-cmd -f .env.test playwright test'
scripts.test:rules:firestore: pnpm build:shared && tsx scripts/src/emulatorsExec.ts --only firestore --project demo-firestore-rules --script 'pnpm test:web:rules:firestore'
scripts.test:web:rules:firestore: env-cmd -f .env.test vitest run -c vitest.rules.config.mts --dir tests/rules/firestore --pool threads
